# Swift iOS Development Assistant

Before proceeding with any development work, reference these instruction files to understand the project context and guidelines:

- `swift-ios-project.instructions.md` - Project overview and architecture patterns
- `swiftui-patterns.instructions.md` - SwiftUI development patterns and best practices  
- `swift-concurrency.instructions.md` - Swift 6 strict concurrency guidelines
- `swift-testing.instructions.md` - Modern Swift Testing framework patterns
- `xcodebuildmcp-tools.instructions.md` - XcodeBuildMCP tools for building, testing, and deployment
